mapper.insert: insert into tbl_movieimage(mno, backdroppath, imagecate) values (#{mno}, #{backdroppath}, #{imagecate})
mapper.update: update tbl_movieImage set mno=#{mno}, backdroppath = #{backdroppath}, imagecate = #{imagecate} where backdroppath = #{backdroppath}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_movieimage where mno = #{mno} and imagecate = #{imagecate}
select * from tbl_movieimage join tbl_moviegenre using (mno) where imagecate = #{imagecate}
